entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing near noon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023
